alert.note: Alert for Coshocton; Guernsey; Muskingum; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:46PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN GUERNSEY...COSHOCTON... NORTHERN MUSKINGUM AND SOUTHWESTERN TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 PM EDT... At 1045 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Farmerstown to 6 miles east of Danville. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Coshocton, Newcomerstown, West Lafayette, Dresden, Frazeysburg, Antrim, Warsaw, Conesville, Plainfield, Nellie, Otsego, and Chili. This includes Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 52 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
